data.lyric:
[ti:My Dawg (Explicit)]
[ar:21 Savage/Metro Boomin]
[al:SAVAGE MODE II (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]My Dawg (Explicit) - 21 Savage/Metro Boomin
[00:00.11]Lyrics by：Shéyaa Bin Abraham-Joseph/Leland Wayne/Ahmar Bailey/Bernd Schoenhart
[00:00.22]Composed by：Shéyaa Bin Abraham-Joseph/Leland Wayne/Ahmar Bailey/Bernd Schoenhart
[00:00.34]Just because I didn't remind you don't think I forgot
[00:02.62]
[00:03.77]Just because it ain't happened yet don't think that's it not
[00:06.22]
[00:07.19]Nipsey was solid I know that he up there with Biggie and Pac
[00:09.75]
[00:10.44]My choppa could tell you a story I pray that you don't try to plot
[00:13.38]Stayed a hundred couple n***s changed
[00:15.00]I ain't never went against the grain I could never snort c*****e
[00:18.53]I could never f**k a b***h behind my brother
[00:20.47]Then try to turn her to my main
[00:22.09]Clout chasin' got him in a wood box can't believe he died for the fame
[00:25.20]He'll risk it all for a name I was comin' hard 'fore I came
[00:28.75]I ain't know nothin' 'bout no Visa I was in the park with the gang
[00:32.27]Moms be feelin' bad I try to tell her she is not to blame
[00:35.73]No social security couldn't get a license but I still didn't complain
[00:38.77]
[00:39.28]I went and got and I ain't ask for no handout
[00:41.12]Lil' n***a we are not the same
[00:42.58]You know what I'm on first girlfriend did me wrong
[00:46.07]I swear to God that every girl after that I was gon' do 'em wrong
[00:49.31]Different b***h in my bed every night but I still be feelin' alone
[00:52.82]Matter fact I finna be with one probably right after I finish this song
[00:56.26]That's my dawg that's my dawg
[00:58.00]He gon' ride he gon' ride off the leash off the leash
[01:01.43]He gon' slide he gon' slide she know I cheat she know I cheat
[01:04.69]She know I lie she know I lie I be geeked up I be fried 21
[01:09.92]Sweep the room we pull up with brooms 21 21
[01:13.37]Smokin' girl scout you can smell the fumes smell the fumes
[01:16.88]Don't approach me 'bout your wifey if she choose p***y
[01:20.26]Last girl did that made the news 21
[01:23.50]N***a keep talkin' that U.K. s**t like I don't got AKs 21
[01:26.87]Like 'cause I was born overseas these mo'f**kers ain't gon' spray-spray the f**k
[01:30.23]Pull up in your hood n***a 9-1-1 y'all better call mayday
[01:32.83]
[01:33.49]From Glenwood all the way to Martin Luther King n***s know we don't play-play
[01:36.71]Caught him down bad 21 broad daylight I ain't need no mask 21
[01:40.21]Paid in full 21 all the opp h*es get shot in the a*s
[01:43.09]Strip a rap n***a if I ever get low on cash 21
[01:45.61]Middle school I ain't go to class I was hangin' in the hallway
[01:47.79]I ain't have a pass on God
[01:49.12]High school I ain't even go
[01:50.37]I was hangin' in the colony tryna sell gas straight up
[01:52.48]In a hotbox with Chevy Lil Harold and Rock ready to crash 21
[01:55.97]Tried to break in the pawnshop on Candler Road
[01:58.03]But the rod wouldn't smash 21
[01:59.32]Larry got killed couldn't believe this s**t
[02:00.89]Man the tears started falling' down fast on God
[02:02.82]Lick on McAfee found a h*e split
[02:04.40]But we really had came for the cash true story
[02:06.35]I'm prayin' to Ogunda so much s**t in the street and my past 21
[02:09.56]I told T-Tay that buddy was a f**k n***a boom
[02:11.84]He got on the stand rat
[02:13.04]200K to the lawyer lil' brother gon' make sure
[02:15.27]You get out the cans 21 21
[02:16.71]
[02:18.82]That's my dawg that's my dawg
[02:20.28]He gon' ride he gon' ride off the leash off the leash
[02:23.73]He gon' slide he gon' slide she know I cheat she know I cheat
[02:27.13]She know I lie she know I lie I be geeked up I be fried 21
[02:31.59]
[02:32.21]Sweep the room we pull up with brooms 21 21
[02:35.69]Smokin' girl scout you can smell the fumes smell the fumes
[02:39.12]Don't approach me 'bout your wifey if she choose p***y
[02:42.51]Last girl did that made the news
data.trans:
[ti:My Dawg (Explicit)]
[ar:21 Savage/Metro Boomin]
[al:SAVAGE MODE II (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.11]//
[00:00.22]//
[00:00.34]只是因为我没有想起你 不要以为我忘记了
[00:02.62]
[00:03.77]只是因为还没有发生 不要以为这不可能
[00:06.22]
[00:07.19]Nipsey地位无人可以撼动 我知道他跟Biggie和Pac比肩
[00:09.75]
[00:10.44]我的枪可以给你讲个故事 我期望你不会耍心眼
[00:13.38]我忠于本心 有些人大变模样
[00:15.00]我永远不会背叛我的做人原则 我绝对不会碰那种东西
[00:18.53]我绝不会背着我的兄弟抢女人
[00:20.47]试图让她成为我的正牌女友
[00:22.09]追名逐利让他命丧黄泉 不敢相信他因为名声丢掉小命
[00:25.20]他愿意为了名声孤注一掷 一路走来 我历尽艰险
[00:28.75]我对没有合法签证的事情一无所知 我整天和帮派混在一起
[00:32.27]妈妈感觉伤心难过 我试着安慰她 这不是她的错
[00:35.73]没有社会保险 没有拿到驾照可我依然没有半句怨言
[00:38.77]
[00:39.28]我亲力亲为 我不会求人施舍
[00:41.12]小兄弟 我们是不一样的
[00:42.58]你对我了如指掌 我的初恋女友辜负我的一片深情
[00:46.07]我向上帝发誓 以后我身边的每个女孩 我都不会付出真心
[00:49.31]每天晚上 我身边躺着不同的女人 可我依然感到孤独寂寞
[00:52.82]事实上 在我完成这首歌以后 我可能找到
[00:56.26]这是我的兄弟 这是我的兄弟
[00:58.00]他尽情驰骋 他尽情驰骋 摆脱束缚 摆脱束缚
[01:01.43]他尽情放纵 他尽情放纵 她知道我背叛了她 她知道我背叛了她
[01:04.69]她知道我在说谎 她知道我在说谎 我嗨到不能自已
[01:09.92]我们全副武装 横扫全场
[01:13.37]怒气冲冲的女童子军 你可以闻到弥漫的硝烟
[01:16.88]只要她做出选择 你就不要跟我胡搅蛮缠
[01:20.26]上一个这么做的女孩已经登上新闻
[01:23.50]这些家伙不停地议论英国的事情 就好像我没有带AK步枪一样
[01:26.87]因为我出生在国外 这些家伙根本不会轻举妄动
[01:30.23]在你的街区横行霸道 你最好报警请求帮助
[01:32.83]
[01:33.49]从Glenwood到Martin Luther King 大家知道我们不是闹着玩的
[01:36.71]光天化日之下干掉他 我不需要戴面具
[01:40.21]我心满意足 所有敌人都挨了枪子
[01:43.09]如果我缺钱的话 我再写几首歌
[01:45.61]初中的时候 我总是逃课 我在走廊里徘徊
[01:47.79]我不会得到上帝的宽恕
[01:49.12]我压根没有读过高中
[01:50.37]我四处游荡 试图贩卖那些玩意
[01:52.48]在雪佛兰车子里吞云吐雾 Lil Harold和Rock蓄势待发
[01:55.97]试图抢劫Candler路上的当铺
[01:58.03]守备森严 我砸不开玻璃
[01:59.32]Larry被人杀害 我简直不敢相信
[02:00.89]我忍不住伤心落泪
[02:02.82]我小心谨慎 处处留心
[02:04.40]但是我们为了钞票赴汤蹈火 千真万确
[02:06.35]我向Ogunda祈祷 我身经百战 街头冲突不断
[02:09.56]我告诉T-Tay 这个家伙是个狠角色
[02:11.84]他上了法庭
[02:13.04]花重金聘请律师 小兄弟 我可以保证
[02:15.27]你能够离开监狱
[02:16.71]
[02:18.82]这是我的兄弟 这是我的兄弟
[02:20.28]他尽情驰骋 他尽情驰骋 摆脱束缚 摆脱束缚
[02:23.73]他尽情放纵 他尽情放纵 她知道我背叛了她 她知道我背叛了她
[02:27.13]她知道我在说谎 她知道我在说谎 我嗨到不能自已
[02:31.59]
[02:32.21]我们全副武装 横扫全场
[02:35.69]怒气冲冲的女童子军 你可以闻到弥漫的硝烟
[02:39.12]只要她做出选择 你就不要跟我胡搅蛮缠
[02:42.51]上一个这么做的女孩已经登上新闻
